snippet: Drinking in moderation not only helps ward off heart disease, but is also beneficial to survivors of heart attacks, a 20-year study of nearly 2,000 men shows.
abstract: Jennifer K Pai study in the European Heart Journal finds that even after a heart attack, drinking one alcoholic drink a day may be healthy for men.
lead_paragraph: Drinking in moderation not only helps ward off heart disease, but is also beneficial to survivors of heart attacks, a 20-year study of nearly 2,000 men shows.

headline.seo: Moderate Alcohol Intake May Help Heart Attack Survivors
headline.main: Patterns: Alcohol May Help Heart Attack Survivors
